name: Gigapause Dark
description:
Is Gigapause a bit too eye-searing for your tastes? Then this is the right theme for you!
Created by gigapause user foxythepirate
additional_info:
Curently version 1.0. Please tell me any problems you have!
Problems I know are in this version:
1. The right sidebar is normal.
2. The note on the top is normal.
3. It affects profiles for some reason.
